changelog.title: What's new on LionSkins:
changelog.2019_10_20_001: The new Classic Knife was added
changelog.2019_10_21_001: Now you can check out prices for the glove skins!
changelog.2019_11_19_001: New knives from the Shattered Web collection were added
changelog.2020_05_09_001: Prices from the CS.Money platform are now available!
changelog.2020_05_22_001: Visualize the skins you own and evaluate the price of your Steam inventory!
changelog.2021_02_12_001: Prices from the Skinport platform are now available!
changelog.2021_10_03_001: Collectible Pins and Patches have been added too

head.title: LionSkins - Compare prices of thousands of skins for your favorite games
head.description: Compare prices of thousands of skins for your favorite video games among the most trusted marketplaces

deletion.confirm_description: Are you sure you want to delete this list?
